title: Gov. Gavin Newsom | Trump Retaliates Against Impeachment Witnesses as Rudy Digs Up Dirt in Ukraine: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump's retaliation against impeachment witnesses as his attorney general works with Rudy Giuliani to keep digging up dirt on his political rivals.

Then, he speaks with Gavin Newsom, governor of California, about the lawsuits between California and the Trump administration.

Governor Newsom also takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for this podcast.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
